trans-unit.source: Represents a series of connected lines and curves.
trans-unit.target: 表示一系列連接的直線和曲線。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Applications use paths to draw outlines of shapes, fill the interiors of shapes, and create clipping regions.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式會使用路徑來繪製圖形外，填滿的圖案，內部建立裁剪區域。

trans-unit.source: The graphics engine maintains the coordinates of geometric shapes in a path in world coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: 圖形引擎會維護全局座標空間在路徑中的幾何形狀的座標。

trans-unit.source: A path may be composed of any number of figures (subpaths).
trans-unit.target: 路徑可能會包含任何數目的數字 （路徑）。

trans-unit.source: Each figure is either composed of a sequence of connected lines and curves or a geometric shape primitive.
trans-unit.target: 每一個圖形可能是由一系列連接的直線和曲線或基本幾何形狀組成。

trans-unit.source: The starting point of a figure is the first point in the sequence of connected lines and curves.
trans-unit.target: 圖形的起點是序列中連接的直線和曲線的第一個點。

trans-unit.source: The ending point is the last point in the sequence.
trans-unit.target: 結束點則是序列中的最後一個點。

trans-unit.source: The starting and ending points of a geometric shape primitive are defined by the primitive specification.
trans-unit.target: 基本規格所定義的開始和結束點的基本幾何形狀。

trans-unit.source: A figure that consists of a sequence of connected lines and curves (whose starting and ending points may be coincident) is an open figure, unless it is closed explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 數字組成的一系列連接的直線和曲線 （其開始和結束點可能同一） 是開放的圖表，除非它已明確地關閉。

trans-unit.source: A figure can be closed explicitly, by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.CloseFigure%2A> method, which closes the current figure by connecting a line from the ending point to the starting point.
trans-unit.target: 圖可以明確地關閉使用<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.CloseFigure%2A>方法，它會關閉目前的圖形從結束點的線條連接的起始點。</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.CloseFigure%2A>

trans-unit.source: A figure that consists of a geometric shape primitive is a closed figure.
trans-unit.target: 包含幾何形狀基本類型圖是封閉的圖表。

trans-unit.source: For purposes of filling and clipping (for example, if a path is rendered using <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FillPath%2A>), all open figures are closed by adding a line from the figure's first point to its last point.
trans-unit.target: 基於填滿和裁剪的 (例如，如果使用轉譯路徑<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FillPath%2A>)，為所有開啟數據都將從圖中的第一個點的一行加入至最後一個點，已關閉。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FillPath%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new figure is implicitly started when a path is created or when a figure is closed.
trans-unit.target: 建立路徑時，或已關閉圖時，會隱含地開始新的圖形。

trans-unit.source: A new figure is explicitly created when the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.StartFigure%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 新的圖時，會明確地建立<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.StartFigure%2A>方法呼叫。</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.StartFigure%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a geometric shape primitive is added to a path, it adds a figure containing the geometric shape, and also implicitly starts a new figure.
trans-unit.target: 當幾何圖形原始物件加入至路徑時，它會將包含幾何形狀圖，並也隱含地開始新的圖形。

trans-unit.source: Consequently, there is always a current figure in a path.
trans-unit.target: 因此，一定會有目前的圖形路徑中。

trans-unit.source: When lines and curves are added to a path, an implicit line is added as needed to connect the ending point of the current figure to the starting point of the new lines and curves to form a sequence of connected lines and curves.
trans-unit.target: 當直線和曲線加入至路徑時，隱含的線條會加入視連線目前圖形的結束點的新線條和曲線來形成一系列連接的直線和曲線開始點。

trans-unit.source: A figure has a direction that describes how line and curve segments are traced between the starting point and the ending point.
trans-unit.target: 圖中有描述如何將直線和曲線線段追蹤之間的起點和終點的方向。

trans-unit.source: The direction is defined in the order that lines and curves are added to a figure, or is defined by the geometric shape primitive.
trans-unit.target: 方向是直線和曲線加入至圖形，或基本幾何形狀所定義的順序定義。

trans-unit.source: The direction is used in determining the path interiors for clipping and fill.
trans-unit.target: 方向會用來決定裁剪和填滿的路徑內部。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> class with a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.FillMode*> value of <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>類別<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.FillMode*>值<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode"> </xref>。</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.FillMode*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode"></xref> enumeration that determines how the interior of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> is filled.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode"> </xref>列舉，可判斷如何這個內部<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>填滿。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathPointType"></xref> and <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> arrays.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>類別具有指定<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathPointType"></xref>和<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures that defines the coordinates of the points that make up this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>結構定義構成這點的座標<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathPointType"></xref> enumeration elements that specifies the type of each corresponding point in the `pts` array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathPointType"></xref>列舉項目，指定的類型中每個對應點`pts`陣列。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> array with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathPointType"></xref> and <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> arrays.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>與指定的陣列<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathPointType"></xref>和<xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures that defines the coordinates of the points that make up this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>結構定義構成這點的座標<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathPointType"></xref> enumeration elements that specifies the type of each corresponding point in the `pts` array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathPointType"></xref>列舉項目，指定的類型中每個對應點`pts`陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures that defines the coordinates of the points that make up this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>結構定義構成這點的座標<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathPointType"></xref> enumeration elements that specifies the type of each corresponding point in the `pts` array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathPointType"></xref>列舉項目，指定的類型中每個對應點`pts`陣列。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode"></xref> enumeration that specifies how the interiors of shapes in this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> are filled.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode"> </xref>列舉，指定如何在此形狀內部， <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>填滿。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> array with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathPointType"></xref> and <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> arrays and with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode"></xref> enumeration element.

trans-unit.source: Appends an elliptical arc to the current figure.
trans-unit.target: 將橢圓形弧線附加至目前的圖形。

trans-unit.source: If there are previous lines or curves in the figure, a line is added to connect the endpoint of the previous segment to the beginning of the arc.
trans-unit.target: 如果先前的線條或曲線圖中的，一行加入上一個區段端點連接至弧線的開頭。

trans-unit.source: The arc is traced along the perimeter of the ellipse bounded by the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 弧線被沿著指定之矩形所限定的橢圓形的周邊。

trans-unit.source: The starting point of the arc is determined by measuring clockwise from the x-axis of the ellipse (at the 0-degree angle) by the number of degrees in the start angle.
trans-unit.target: 開始角度的度數數目 （在 0 度角） 橢圓形的 x 軸順時針測量取決於弧形的起點。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint is similarly located by measuring clockwise from the starting point by the number of degrees in the sweep angle.
trans-unit.target: 端點同樣位於藉由從起點朝順時針方向測量的掃掠角度的度數。

trans-unit.source: If the sweep angle is greater than 360 degrees or less than -360 degrees, the arc is swept by exactly 360 degrees or -360 degrees, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果掃掠角度大於 360 度或小於-360 度，則分別由 360 度或-360 度清理弧線。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the rectangular bounds of the ellipse from which the arc is taken.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> ，代表從中取得弧線的橢圓形的矩形界限。

trans-unit.source: The starting angle of the arc, measured in degrees clockwise from the x-axis.
trans-unit.target: 弧線的開始角度測量，以從 x 軸順時針旋轉的角度為單位。

trans-unit.source: The angle between `startAngle` and the end of the arc.
trans-unit.target: 之間的角度`startAngle`和弧形結束。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> that represents the rectangular bounds of the ellipse from which the arc is taken.

trans-unit.source: Adds a cubic Bézier curve to the current figure.
trans-unit.target: 將目前的圖中的三次方貝茲曲線。

trans-unit.source: The cubic curve is constructed from the first point to the fourth point by using the second and third points as control points.
trans-unit.target: 使用第二個和第三個點做為控制點三次方曲線是從第一個點建構至第四個點。

trans-unit.source: If there is a previous line or curve segment in the figure, a line is added to connect the endpoint of the previous segment to the starting point of the cubic curve.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有上一個線條或曲線線段圖中的，新增的一行上一個區段端點連接到三次方曲線開始點。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the starting point of the curve.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>表示曲線的起點。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the first control point for the curve.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>表示曲線的第一個控制點。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the second control point for the curve.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>表示曲線的第二個控制點。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the endpoint of the curve.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> ，表示曲線的點。

trans-unit.source: Adds a cubic Bézier curve to the current figure.
trans-unit.target: 將目前的圖中的三次方貝茲曲線。

trans-unit.source: The cubic curve is constructed from the first point to the fourth point by using the second and third points as control points.
trans-unit.target: 使用第二個和第三個點做為控制點三次方曲線是從第一個點建構至第四個點。

trans-unit.source: If there is a previous line or curve segment in the figure, a line is added to connect the endpoint of the previous segment to the starting point of the cubic curve.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有上一個線條或曲線線段圖中的，新增的一行上一個區段端點連接到三次方曲線開始點。

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref>表示曲線的起點。

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref>表示曲線的第一個控制點。

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref>表示曲線的第二個控制點。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> that represents the endpoint of the curve.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> ，表示曲線的點。

trans-unit.source: Adds a sequence of connected cubic Bézier curves to the current figure.
trans-unit.target: 將目前的圖形一系列連接的三次方貝茲曲線。

trans-unit.source: The `points` parameter specifies an array of endpoints and control points of the connected curves.
trans-unit.target: `points`參數指定的連接曲線控制點和端點的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The first curve is constructed from the first point to the fourth point in the `points` array by using the second and third points as control points.
trans-unit.target: 曲線的第一個從第一個點建構中的第四個點`points`陣列使用的第二個和第三個點做為控制點。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the endpoint of the previous curve, each subsequent curve in the sequence needs exactly three more points: the next two points in the sequence are control points, and the third is the endpoint for the added curve.
trans-unit.target: 除了先前曲線的結束點，每個後續的曲線順序中必須正好是三個的多個點︰ 序列中的下面兩個點是控點，以及第三個加入的曲線的端點。

trans-unit.source: If there are previous lines or curves in the figure, a line is added to connect the endpoint of the previous segment to the starting point of the first cubic curve in the sequence.
trans-unit.target: 如果先前的線條或曲線圖中的，一條線被加入先前線段的端點連接到序列中的第一個三次方曲線開始點。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures that represents the points that define the curves.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>結構，表示定義曲線的點。

trans-unit.source: Adds a closed curve to this path.
trans-unit.target: 將封閉的曲線加入這個路徑。

trans-unit.source: A cardinal spline curve is used because the curve travels through each of the points in the array.
trans-unit.target: 因為該曲線會透過每一個點陣列中，會使用基本曲線。

trans-unit.source: The user must keep the original points if they are needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果有需要使用者必須保留原始的點。

trans-unit.source: The original points are converted to cubic Bézier control points internally, therefore there is no mechanism for returning the original points.
trans-unit.target: 原始的點會在內部轉換成三次方貝茲控點，因此沒有任何機制傳回原始的點。

trans-unit.source: If the first point and the last point in the `points` array are not the same point, the curve is closed by connecting these two points.
trans-unit.target: 如果第一個點並將最後一個點`points`陣列不是相同的點，會關閉連接這些點之兩個曲線。

trans-unit.source: The tension value cannot be set for this method, and defaults to a value equivalent to 0.5.
trans-unit.target: 張力值無法設定，此方法，並預設為相當於 0.5 的值。

trans-unit.source: If there are previous lines or curves in the figure, a line is added to connect the endpoint of the previous segment the starting point of the line.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有先前的線條或曲線圖中的，會加入連接的端點上一個區段線條的起點。

trans-unit.source: The `points` parameter specifies an array of endpoints.
trans-unit.target: `points`參數會指定端點的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The first two specify the first line.
trans-unit.target: 前兩個指定的第一行。

trans-unit.source: Each additional point specifies the endpoint of a line segment whose starting point is the endpoint of the previous line.
trans-unit.target: 每個額外的點指定的直線線段的起點是上一行的端點的端點。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> structures that represents the points that define the line segments to add.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>結構，表示定義要加入之直線線段的點。

trans-unit.source: Appends a series of connected line segments to the end of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>.

trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> to add.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that specifies whether the first figure in the added path is part of the last figure in this path.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指定第一個圖中加入的路徑是否在這個路徑的最後一個圖形的一部分。

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> specifies that (if possible) the first figure in the added path is part of the last figure in this path.
trans-unit.target: 值為<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>指定 （如果可能） 第一個圖中加入的路徑是在這個路徑的最後一個圖形的一部分。

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> specifies that the first figure in the added path is separate from the last figure in this path.
trans-unit.target: 值為<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>指定第一個圖中加入的路徑不同於這個路徑中的最後一個圖形。

trans-unit.source: Adds the outline of a pie shape to this path.
trans-unit.target: 將此路徑的派形的外框。

trans-unit.source: The pie shape is defined by a partial outline of an ellipse and the two radial lines that intersect the endpoints of the partial outline.
trans-unit.target: 部分橢圓形和兩條放射線交集部分的外框的結束點的外框定義派形。

trans-unit.source: The partial outline begins at `startAngle` (measured clockwise from the x-axis) and ends at `startAngle` + `sweepAngle`.
trans-unit.target: 部分的外框開始`startAngle`（從 x 軸順時針旋轉單位），並於結束`startAngle` + `sweepAngle`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie is drawn.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>代表週框定義橢圓形的圓形圖會繪製。

trans-unit.source: The starting angle for the pie section, measured in degrees clockwise from the x-axis.
trans-unit.target: 開始角度的派形區段，以從 x 軸順時針旋轉的角度。

trans-unit.source: The angle between `startAngle` and the end of the pie section, measured in degrees clockwise from `startAngle`.
trans-unit.target: 之間的角度`startAngle`和派形區段，以度為單位的順時針方向從結尾`startAngle`。

trans-unit.source: Adds a polygon to this path.
trans-unit.target: 將多邊形加入至這個路徑。

trans-unit.source: The points in the `points` array specify the vertices of a polygon.
trans-unit.target: 中的點`points`陣列指定多邊形的頂點。

trans-unit.source: If the first point in the array is not the same as the last point, those two points are connected to close the polygon.
trans-unit.target: 如果陣列中的第一個點不是最後一個點相同，這兩個點被連接到結束此多邊形。

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref>指定文字格式設定資訊，例如行距和對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: Adds a text string to this path.
trans-unit.target: 將文字字串加入至這個路徑。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> to add.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>要新增</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> that represents the name of the font with which the test is drawn.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref>表示繪製與測試之字型的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"></xref> enumeration that represents style information about the text (bold, italic, and so on).
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"> </xref>表示樣式 （粗體、 斜體等等） 的文字資訊的列舉。

trans-unit.source: This must be cast as an integer (see the example code later in this section).
trans-unit.target: 這必須轉換為整數 （請參閱本節稍後的範例程式碼）。

trans-unit.source: The height of the em square box that bounds the character.
trans-unit.target: 限制字元的 em 方形高度。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> that represents the rectangle that bounds the text.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref>表示的矩形會框住文字。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> that specifies text formatting information, such as line spacing and alignment.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref>指定文字格式設定資訊，例如行距和對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: Clears all markers from this path.
trans-unit.target: 清除此路徑的所有標記。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.SetMarkers%2A> method to create a marker at the current location in a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.SetMarkers%2A>建立<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>中目前的位置標記的方法</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.SetMarkers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextMarker%2A> method to iterate through the existing markers in a path.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextMarker%2A>方法來逐一查看現有的資料標記在路徑中。</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextMarker%2A>

trans-unit.source: Markers are used to separate groups of subpaths.
trans-unit.target: 標記用來分隔子路徑的群組。

trans-unit.source: One or more subpaths can be contained between two markers.
trans-unit.target: 一個或多個子可以包含兩個資料標記之間。

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this path.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個路徑的完整複本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> this method creates, cast as an object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>這個方法會建立，轉換為物件。

trans-unit.source: Closes all open figures in this path and starts a new figure.
trans-unit.target: 關閉所有開啟的數字，此路徑中，並開始新的圖形。

trans-unit.source: It closes each open figure by connecting a line from its endpoint to its starting point.
trans-unit.target: 從其端點的一條線連接到它的起點，它就會關閉每個開放的圖表。

trans-unit.source: Closes the current figure and starts a new figure.
trans-unit.target: 關閉目前的圖形，並開始新的圖形。

trans-unit.source: If the current figure contains a sequence of connected lines and curves, the method closes the loop by connecting a line from the endpoint to the starting point.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的圖包含一系列連接的直線和曲線，該方法會藉由從端點的線條連接的起始點關閉迴圈。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的資源全部釋出<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Calling Dispose allows the resources used by this <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 Dispose 允許所使用的資源<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>都重新配置用於其他用途。</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode"></xref> enumeration that determines how the interiors of shapes in this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> are filled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode"></xref>列舉，可判斷如何在此形狀內部， <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>填滿。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode"></xref> enumeration that specifies how the interiors of shapes in this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> are filled.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode"> </xref>列舉，指定如何在此形狀內部， <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>填滿。

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 允許物件嘗試釋放資源，並透過記憶體回收開始前執行其他清除作業。

trans-unit.source: Converts each curve in this path into a sequence of connected line segments.
trans-unit.target: 將此路徑中的每個曲線轉換成一系列連接的直線線段。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified transform and then converts each curve in this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> into a sequence of connected line segments.
trans-unit.target: 適用於指定的轉換，然後將轉換中的每個曲線<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>成序列連接的直線線段。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> by which to transform this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> before flattening.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref>用來轉換這個<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>之前扁平化。

trans-unit.source: Converts each curve in this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> into a sequence of connected line segments.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換中的每個曲線<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>成序列連接的直線線段。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> by which to transform this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> before flattening.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref>用來轉換這個<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>之前扁平化。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum permitted error between the curve and its flattened approximation.
trans-unit.target: 指定介於曲線及其簡維的近似值之間的最大允許的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0.25 is the default.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0.25 的值。

trans-unit.source: Reducing the flatness value will increase the number of line segments in the approximation.
trans-unit.target: 降低扁平值會增加在大約的直線線段數目。

trans-unit.source: Returns a rectangle that bounds this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回此界限的矩形<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The size of the returned bounding rectangle is influenced by the type of end caps, pen width, and pen miter limit, and therefore produces a "loose fit" to the bounded path.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的週框矩形的大小會受到端點、 畫筆寬度和畫筆斜接角限制的類型，因此會產生已繫結路徑的"鬆散符合"。

trans-unit.source: The approximate formula is: the initial bounding rectangle is inflated by pen width, and this result is multiplied by the miter limit, plus some additional margin to allow for end caps.
trans-unit.target: 大約的公式是︰ 初始的週框根據畫筆寬度膨脹，和此結果會乘以斜接角限制，加上一些額外邊距以便端點。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> that represents a rectangle that bounds this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref>表示框住這個矩形<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a rectangle that bounds this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> when this path is transformed by the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回此界限的矩形<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>此路徑會轉換時指定<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The size of the returned bounding rectangle is influenced by the type of end caps, pen width, and pen miter limit, and therefore produces a "loose fit" to the bounded path.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的週框矩形的大小會受到端點、 畫筆寬度和畫筆斜接角限制的類型，因此會產生已繫結路徑的"鬆散符合"。

trans-unit.source: The approximate formula is: the initial bounding rectangle is inflated by pen width, and this result is multiplied by the miter limit, plus some additional margin to allow for end caps.
trans-unit.target: 大約的公式是︰ 初始的週框根據畫筆寬度膨脹，和此結果會乘以斜接角限制，加上一些額外邊距以便端點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> that specifies a transformation to be applied to this path before the bounding rectangle is calculated.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref> ，指定要套用到此路徑，然後再計算之周框的轉換。

trans-unit.source: This path is not permanently transformed; the transformation is used only during the process of calculating the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 此路徑不永久轉換。轉換為只計算之周框的過程中使用。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> that represents a rectangle that bounds this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref>表示框住這個矩形<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a rectangle that bounds this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> when the current path is transformed by the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> and drawn with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回此界限的矩形<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>轉換目前的路徑時指定<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref>並以指定繪製<xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The size of the returned bounding rectangle is influenced by the type of end caps, pen width, and pen miter limit, and therefore produces a "loose fit" to the bounded path.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的週框矩形的大小會受到端點、 畫筆寬度和畫筆斜接角限制的類型，因此會產生已繫結路徑的"鬆散符合"。

trans-unit.source: The approximate formula is: the initial bounding rectangle is inflated by pen width, and this result is multiplied by the miter limit, plus some additional margin to allow for end caps.
trans-unit.target: 大約的公式是︰ 初始的週框根據畫筆寬度膨脹，和此結果會乘以斜接角限制，加上一些額外邊距以便端點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> that specifies a transformation to be applied to this path before the bounding rectangle is calculated.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref> ，指定要套用到此路徑，然後再計算之周框的轉換。

trans-unit.source: This path is not permanently transformed; the transformation is used only during the process of calculating the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 此路徑不永久轉換。轉換為只計算之周框的過程中使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> with which to draw the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>用來繪製<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref>表示框住這個矩形<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the last point in the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathPoints*> array of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得最後一個點中<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathPoints*>這個陣列<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>。</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathPoints*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> that represents the last point in this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> ，代表在這個最後一個點<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified point is contained within (under) the outline of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> when drawn with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否指定的點包含在 （下方） 的大綱<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>與指定物件繪製時<xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method tests to see if the outline of a given path is rendered visible at the specified point.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會測試以查看是否給定路徑的大綱會轉譯在指定的時間點可見。

trans-unit.source: Gets a that encapsulates arrays of points (points) and types (types) for this .
trans-unit.target: 取得封裝的點陣列 (points) 和類型 (types) 這個 。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathData"></xref> that encapsulates arrays for both the points and types for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathData"> </xref>同時之點的陣列，這個型別封裝<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the points in the path.
trans-unit.target: 在路徑中取得的點。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> objects that represent the path.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>表示路徑的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the types of the corresponding points in the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathPoints*> array.
trans-unit.target: 取得型別中的對應點<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathPoints*>陣列。</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathPoints*>

trans-unit.source: The array of bytes returned by the PathTypes property specifies point types and flags for the data points in a path.
trans-unit.target: PathTypes 屬性所傳回的位元組陣列指定之路徑中的點類型以及資料點的旗標。

trans-unit.source: For each point, bits 0 through 2 indicate the type of a point, and bits 3 through 7 hold a set of flags that specify the attributes of a point.
trans-unit.target: 針對每個點，位元 0 到 2 則表示點的類型和 3 到 7 位元會保存一組指定的點屬性的旗標。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows possible values and their meanings.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示可能的值和其意義。

trans-unit.source: |Value|Meaning| |-----------|-------------| |0|Indicates that the point is the start of a figure.| |1|Indicates that the point is one of the two endpoints of a line.| |3|Indicates that the point is an endpoint or control point of a cubic Bézier spline.| |0x7|Masks all bits except for the three low-order bits, which indicate the point type.| |0x20|Specifies that the point is a marker.| |0x80|Specifies that the point is the last point in a closed subpath (figure).|
trans-unit.target: |值 |這表示 | |-----------|-------------| |&0; |表示點是圖形的開始。 | |&1; |表示點是一個兩個線條的端點。 | |&3; |表示點的三次方貝茲曲線的結束點或控制項點。 | |&0;x7 |除了三個低序位位元，指出 point 類型的所有位元會遮罩。 | |&0;x20 |指定的點是一個標記。 | |&0;x80 |指定該點是否已關閉的子路徑 （圖） 中的最後一個點。 |

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes that specifies the types of the corresponding points in the path.
trans-unit.target: 在路徑中指定的相對應的點類型的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of elements in the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathPoints*> or the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathTypes*> array.
trans-unit.target: 取得中的項目數<> *> 或<> *> 陣列。

trans-unit.source: An integer that specifies the number of elements in the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathPoints*> or the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathTypes*> array.
trans-unit.target: 指定中的項目數的整數<> *> 或<> *> 陣列。

trans-unit.source: Empties the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathPoints*> and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathTypes*> arrays and sets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode"></xref> to <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 清空<> *> 和<> *> 的陣列，並設定<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode"></xref>至<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Reverses the order of points in the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathPoints*> array of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 反轉順序中的點數<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathPoints*>這個陣列<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>。</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathPoints*>

trans-unit.source: Sets a marker on this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此設定標記<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method creates a marker on the path that can be used to separate sections of the path.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可用來區隔的路徑區段的路徑上建立資料標記。

trans-unit.source: You can then use the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextMarker%2A> methods to iterate through the markers in the path.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以使用<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextMarker%2A>方法來逐一查看的標記在路徑中。</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextMarker%2A>

trans-unit.source: Markers are used to separate groups of subpaths.
trans-unit.target: 標記用來分隔子路徑的群組。

trans-unit.source: One or more subpaths can be contained between two markers in the path.
trans-unit.target: 可包含一個或多個子路徑中的兩個資料標記之間。

trans-unit.source: Starts a new figure without closing the current figure.
trans-unit.target: 開始新的圖形，而不需要關閉目前的圖形。

trans-unit.source: All subsequent points added to the path are added to this new figure.
trans-unit.target: 所有後續的點加入路徑中會加入至這個新的圖形。

trans-unit.source: The user must keep the original points if they are needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果有需要使用者必須保留原始的點。

trans-unit.source: The original points are converted to cubic Bézier control points internally, therefore there is no mechanism for returning the original points.
trans-unit.target: 原始的點會在內部轉換成三次方貝茲控點，因此沒有任何機制傳回原始的點。

trans-unit.source: This method starts a new subpath in the path.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會啟動新的子路徑的路徑中。

trans-unit.source: Subpaths allow you to separate a path into sections and use the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator> class to iterate through the subpaths.
trans-unit.target: 路徑可讓您分隔成區段的路徑並使用<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator>來逐一查看子路徑的類別。</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator>

trans-unit.source: Applies a transform matrix to this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 轉換矩陣套用至這個<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The transformation can scale, translate, rotate, or skew the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>.
trans-unit.target: 轉換可以調整、 翻譯、 旋轉或扭曲<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> that represents the transformation to apply.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref> ，代表要套用的轉換。

trans-unit.source: Applies a warp transform, defined by a rectangle and a parallelogram, to this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 適用於所矩形和平行四邊形，此定義 warp 轉換<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures that define a parallelogram to which the rectangle defined by `srcRect` is transformed.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>結構會定義在所定義的矩形的平行四邊形`srcRect`轉換。

trans-unit.source: The array can contain either three or four elements.
trans-unit.target: 陣列可以包含三或四個項目。

trans-unit.source: If the array contains three elements, the lower-right corner of the parallelogram is implied by the first three points.
trans-unit.target: 如果陣列包含三個項目，平行四邊形的右下角會隱含的前三個點。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> that represents the rectangle that is transformed to the parallelogram defined by `destPoints`.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref>表示所定義的平行四邊形轉換的矩形`destPoints`。

trans-unit.source: Applies a warp transform, defined by a rectangle and a parallelogram, to this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 適用於所矩形和平行四邊形，此定義 warp 轉換<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures that define a parallelogram to which the rectangle defined by `srcRect` is transformed.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>結構會定義在所定義的矩形的平行四邊形`srcRect`轉換。

trans-unit.source: The array can contain either three or four elements.
trans-unit.target: 陣列可以包含三或四個項目。

trans-unit.source: If the array contains three elements, the lower-right corner of the parallelogram is implied by the first three points.

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref>表示所定義的平行四邊形轉換的矩形`destPoints`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> that specifies a geometric transform to apply to the path.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref> ，指定要套用至路徑的幾何轉換。

trans-unit.source: Applies a warp transform, defined by a rectangle and a parallelogram, to this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 適用於所矩形和平行四邊形，此定義 warp 轉換<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures that defines a parallelogram to which the rectangle defined by `srcRect` is transformed.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>定義平行四邊形所定義的矩形的結構`srcRect`轉換。

trans-unit.source: The array can contain either three or four elements.
trans-unit.target: 陣列可以包含三或四個項目。

trans-unit.source: If the array contains three elements, the lower-right corner of the parallelogram is implied by the first three points.
trans-unit.target: 如果陣列包含三個項目，平行四邊形的右下角會隱含的前三個點。

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref>表示所定義的平行四邊形轉換的矩形`destPoints`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> that specifies a geometric transform to apply to the path.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref> ，指定要套用至路徑的幾何轉換。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WarpMode"></xref> enumeration that specifies whether this warp operation uses perspective or bilinear mode.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WarpMode"> </xref>列舉，指定此 warp 作業使用檢視方塊或雙線性模式。

trans-unit.source: Applies a warp transform, defined by a rectangle and a parallelogram, to this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 適用於所矩形和平行四邊形，此定義 warp 轉換<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures that define a parallelogram to which the rectangle defined by `srcRect` is transformed.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref>結構會定義在所定義的矩形的平行四邊形`srcRect`轉換。

trans-unit.source: The array can contain either three or four elements.
trans-unit.target: 陣列可以包含三或四個項目。

trans-unit.source: If the array contains three elements, the lower-right corner of the parallelogram is implied by the first three points.
trans-unit.target: 如果陣列包含三個項目，平行四邊形的右下角會隱含的前三個點。

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref>表示所定義的平行四邊形轉換的矩形`destPoints`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> that specifies a geometric transform to apply to the path.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref> ，指定要套用至路徑的幾何轉換。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WarpMode"></xref> enumeration that specifies whether this warp operation uses perspective or bilinear mode.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.WarpMode"> </xref>列舉，指定此 warp 作業使用檢視方塊或雙線性模式。

trans-unit.source: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies how flat the resulting path is.
trans-unit.target: 是介於 0 到 1 的指定方式一般產生的路徑。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Flatten*> methods.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Flatten*>方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Flatten*>

trans-unit.source: Adds an additional outline to the path.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將額外的外框加入路徑。

trans-unit.source: This method creates an outline around the original lines in this <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>, with a distance between the existing lines and the new outline equal to that of the width of the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> used in the call to Widen.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會在此建立原始程式行外的框<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>，與現有的行和新的外框之間的距離都相等的寬度的<xref:System.Drawing.Pen>Widen 呼叫中使用。</xref:System.Drawing.Pen> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>

trans-unit.source: If you want to fill the space between the lines you must use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FillPath%2A> rather then the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawPath%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要填滿線條之間的空間，您就必須使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FillPath%2A>而不是<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawPath%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawPath%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FillPath%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> that specifies the width between the original outline of the path and the new outline this method creates.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref> ，指定原始路徑的外框，這個方法會建立新的外框之間的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Adds an additional outline to the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 新增其他大綱<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method creates an outline around the original lines in this <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>, with a distance between the existing lines and the new outline equal to that of the width of the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> used in the call to Widen.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會在此建立原始程式行外的框<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>，與現有的行和新的外框之間的距離都相等的寬度的<xref:System.Drawing.Pen>Widen 呼叫中使用。</xref:System.Drawing.Pen> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>

trans-unit.source: If you want to fill the space between the lines you must use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FillPath%2A> rather then the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawPath%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要填滿線條之間的空間，您就必須使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FillPath%2A>而不是<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawPath%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawPath%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FillPath%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> that specifies the width between the original outline of the path and the new outline this method creates.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref> ，指定原始路徑的外框，這個方法會建立新的外框之間的寬度。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> that specifies a transform to apply to the path before widening.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref> ，指定要套用至路徑之前擴展的轉換。

trans-unit.source: Replaces this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> with curves that enclose the area that is filled when this path is drawn by the specified pen.
trans-unit.target: 這會取代<xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>具有括住此路徑繪製在指定的筆觸時填滿區域的曲線。

trans-unit.source: This method creates an outline around the original lines in this <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>, with a distance between the existing lines and the new outline equal to that of the width of the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> used in the call to Widen.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會在此建立原始程式行外的框<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>，與現有的行和新的外框之間的距離都相等的寬度的<xref:System.Drawing.Pen>Widen 呼叫中使用。</xref:System.Drawing.Pen> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>

trans-unit.source: If you want to fill the space between the lines you must use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FillPath%2A> rather then the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawPath%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要填滿線條之間的空間，您就必須使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FillPath%2A>而不是<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawPath%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawPath%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FillPath%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> that specifies the width between the original outline of the path and the new outline this method creates.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref> ，指定原始路徑的外框，這個方法會建立新的外框之間的寬度。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> that specifies a transform to apply to the path before widening.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref> ，指定要套用至路徑之前擴展的轉換。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies the flatness for curves.
trans-unit.target: 值，指定曲線扁平度。
